website_summaries.verdict: It’s hard to beat these versatile and functional diaper pail refills. For any Dékor Plus Pail, they're a smart and economical solution.
pros: Unique pail refill bags where user decides the size, tying and cutting off to take out
Economical choice that fits all Dékor Plus Pails
Possesses convenient warning for when pack is almost depleted
cons: Made of thinner material than other bag refill options

customer_reviews.title: Great Diaper System
customer_reviews.text: I have been very satisfied with the Dekor diaper pail system. The refills are very easy to use. The instructions are printed on each refill and as long as you read them, it’s fairly easy to insert the refill. They are pricey, but each refill lasts us about 1.5-2 months. As previous reviews have mentioned, there is no warning when you are coming to the end of the roll. We make sure to always keep an extra box on hand, so we never run out unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to load into the trash can, adjustable sizing depending on your needs, and cheapest refill bags. I considered not getting a diaper trash can, but decided to try the diaper dekor partly because the refills maintenance cost was not super high. It's worked out very well. Contains the smell without being too pricey for refills. I use disposable diapers part time, and cloth diapers part time, and the refill lasted me about 2 months before replacing (with a 2 to almost 4-month-old). My guess is you'd replace these about monthly if you're using disposable diapers full-time.
customer_reviews.author: G.N.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: These diaper bags are fantastic. Very easy to put in and very easy to remove. There's no waste of bags because you determine when your bag is full and how much to tie off. I would recommend this product and continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Snizzy

customer_reviews.title: The product works just doesn’t stop odor
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if my daughter just has really stench number twos or if these are just not meant to hold in odor. I will change it and the cam itself still stink I’ve only had the system for one and about half way into the new row that this is reviewed. I am probably going to go back to the diaper genie I just thought this was better looking and I liked the way it opened more like a trash can. They function but the odor resistant isn’t there maybe only for pee diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Ripper657

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly into dekor plus bin!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and fit perfectly into the dekor plus bin. We got both from amazon baby registry as gifts and still using them now that our baby girl is almost 3 months old. We use them to put in cloth diapers and it works just fine. Easy to put in and keep pulling it down as you get rid of the dirty diapers and pull down paper for the new soiled ones. Easy Peasy! Usually our baby girl uses 6-7 diapers per day on average and hence 1 packet of refills lasts us for about 1.5-2 months or so (we usually use 2 bags per week).
customer_reviews.author: Vishal Kapoor

customer_reviews.title: Thinner
customer_reviews.text: Sometime in mid 2020 the thickness of the bag changed (got thinner). Theoretically this would be fine: less weight, easier to install in the can. I didn’t really mind until I took a full bag out to my trash can. Dropped it in like normal, and the bag ruptured, spilling diapers all in the can. Been using this product for 2 years and never had that happen before. Seems they might have gone too thin on that redesign.
customer_reviews.author: bike_to_boston

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-Use Quality
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the Diaper Dekor Plus and its refill liner for over five years and two kids... to say we are satisfied with the system would be an understatement. We have never had an issue with the liner tearing and it is strong enough to hold a full load. If you follow the included directions, replacing the liner is very easy. Bottom line, this just plain works.
customer_reviews.author: Frank G.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it - Escaping odors
customer_reviews.text: Great design, just a shame that it doesn’t actually do the job. Smells escape & after just a short time of moderate use the entire unit literally STINKS. Smells bad even when empty, like the plastic has absorbed the everything ever placed inside of it. See my review on the actual pail, here or on YouTube. Not sure if this smell issue is a defect of the pail, the plastic refills, or both but the bottom line is it isn’t worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JaNaely

customer_reviews.title: less waste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this diaper pail specifically because of these bags. I love the ability of making a bag that perfectly fits the number of diapers inside. I love being able to empty my diaper pail at any fullness on trash day. Having bags tied up, sitting, is not my favorite thing. First time installing a new roll can be tricky [especially if you remove the paper ring- dont do that!] But once you get it, the refills are simple. Love this pail and recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hunsberger

customer_reviews.title: I love the dekor plus diaper and these refills
customer_reviews.text: I love the dekor plus diaper and these refills. It does a good job of helping to keep the smell locked away, although it does not completely prevent poopy diaper smells. My favorite part of these liners is that you can control the size of them rather than wait for a bag to be full before throwing it out. So if I happen to throw an especially stinky diaper in the trash, I can cut the refill liner at that point and toss it. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bag for diaper pail. Make sure you order correct size (Classic or Plus as they are not interchangeable.)
customer_reviews.text: I bought the wrong sized refill but was able to exchange for the classic size to match the pail. Buyer be sure you order the correct bag refill with the pail as the bags are not interchangeable. Nice quality plastic bag and comes highly recommended by new Moms to alleviate the dirty diaper odor in the nursery. Is easy to change out bags.
customer_reviews.author: N. NickTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags how you can replace when you need, and not waste a whole bag if it needs emptied sooner because of extra smelly diapers. Has a light scent, I didn’t know of, but it isn’t noticeable outside of the Pail once doors closed.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Gatewood

customer_reviews.title: Fine- a bit tricky to deal with.
customer_reviews.text: These are okay- the dekor system is fine in general, but they do not have any scent and require instructions for putting them in and out of the pail (its a bit different and you have to put them in just the right way). As a tired new parent, it was confusing and annoying to figure out. Now we have the hang of it, but I do wish that they did a bit more for odor control. They are also a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Millionth Purchase - Just Kidding but these are the best.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I've purchased these a million times on Amazon and it's going to continue for another few years. The best part about the bags is that you can make them as small as you need and big as you need. This seller is also amazing, I've never had any issues with my purchases.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works well
customer_reviews.text: These bags are a great. I used normal trash liners for awhile (because it's what I had) and those were a struggle. Open the trash can, get a face full of dirty diaper. These are better, you just get a whiff of dirty diaper when you carry them out. They are slightly finicky to set-up the first couple of times you use them. Use the instructions on the back of the box, they are easier to follow than the ones on the band around the liners.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive fancy trash bag.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the diaper genie product is like a video game console, they make their money from the cartridges. I’m a fan of the genie but the cost of these refills are really expensive compared to garbage bags. If you need to buy these it is probably too late. It’s a great product, just expensive for what you are getting.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Helder

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective solution for diaper disposal
customer_reviews.text: The whole Dekor system is great for diaper disposal. It makes getting rid of them super easy and I like how you can pick the size of the bag yourself. These refills usually end up lasting us about four to five months. We have two toddlers but they are in day care so we do a total of 5 diapers during the week and probably double that on weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good refill bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags have no real scent. They go into the special can. As far as using , quite easy to install into can and the roll can last a good while. These bags you must make a knot at bottom to collect trash and when full cut top and tie that into knot and toss then tie another knot and pull bag down to collect more trash.
customer_reviews.author: RJM 73

customer_reviews.title: We love the Diaper Dekor system and these bags are no ...
customer_reviews.text: We love the Diaper Dekor system and these bags are no exception. #1 They smell great, #2 they're very durable, and #3 you can control how much of the "bag" you're using since they're not actually bags. It's a continuous roll that you tie off at the end, so you can customize the size of the bag. We typically dispose of our diapers every day, or every other day, and if we used a regular trash bag (which you actually can do with the Diaper Dekor) we would be wasting a lot of bag space. I highly recommend this and consider this system to be a registry must-have!
customer_reviews.author: Omer Lahmany

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy - total A +
customer_reviews.text: Our baby is almost 3 months old and these refills and Dekor diaper pail have been perfect. No bad aromas and easy to use. Just toss and go and auto closes.
customer_reviews.author: H.Duenas

customer_reviews.title: Durable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice that you can change the bag when there are two diapers or twenty and not have to throw away a whole bag thanks to one particularly bad diaper. We live upstairs and don’t always get the full bags down to the trash right away but they don’t break open and seem to contain the smell even when they are not in the can. My grandma got the system for us for my shower and I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: RebO29

customer_reviews.title: Don't go cheap on these
customer_reviews.text: I had a store credit to use so I purchased a knock off brand of these bags-I'll never do that again. You can definitely tell the difference between this brand and the other and what I saved with the other version was spent in air fresheners to cover the smell. Will always use these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Duqrn87

customer_reviews.title: You will only get 1 or 2 boxes, not 2 or 4. Listing is misleading!
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the listing, not the product. I find it incredibly misleading that they are saying this is a 2 pack when in fact there is only 1 box in the order with 2 refills inside the box. If I had known that I would have bought from somewhere else with a coupon and I feel duped. Please change the way this reads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The 4pack is nice because you can save some money. They last a while, and are super easy to use. I know I could save money with other methods, but these help cut down on the smell enough to be worthwhile. They seem to be the right size for needing to take out the trash 2x a week.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I really do like these refills, they are fairly easy to reload and you can pack quite a few diapers in each section. I am curious to see if they have a more environmenly friendly option in the future. Overall, I am pleasently surprised by the quality and ease of use of the refills
customer_reviews.author: romero

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Easy to Replace...
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Like the description of the product said, "Most Economical Refill System | Quick & Easy to Replace..." CONS: There is bound to be some odor leaking out of the pail, it’s unavoidable, but I have come to terms with it. I just put the pile in a place where it doesn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: WIH

customer_reviews.title: Great refills
customer_reviews.text: We love our Dekor Plus diaper pail and these refills are perfect. We prefer the 4 pack so we don't have to purchase as often.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hetchler

customer_reviews.title: If you have truckloads of dirty diapers....
customer_reviews.text: Very clever and effective way to dispose of dirty diapers. This allows you to throw away dirty diapers without having to deal with the stench that comes along with it. The bags work well with the Diaper Dekor trash can (which you will need to purchase for this to be a useful product). Very easy to install onto the trash can. Each "bag" will give you several uses as you empty the can and pull down additional bag several times.
customer_reviews.author: Aggressive Owl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but needs to block scent of diapers better. It says there's a powder scent, but I don't smell anything except dirty diapers. We ended up putting one of those car fresheners in the diaper pail and that helped with the smell. The bag is good quality, no problems with breakage or anything and we've used this brand for more than a year now. They're expensive for what they are (it's just plastic after all and nothing special to keep smells in or neutralized). Good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Books

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: They work great but dont mask the smell of diapers like I had hoped. Also they say they're scented, baby powder I believe, I dont smell any scent. They're also a pretty stiff material, so kinda loud when dropped first diaper in it after changing bags but after diapers have a cushion to fall on the bags are pretty quiet.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Only place I can find these.
customer_reviews.text: The directions on the item make them easy to use, but they seem a bit expensive. We were given a Dekor Plus Pail so we have been purchasing the refills on Amazon, but I wish they were available in stores. The refills do last a while so we will most likely continue purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Great refills. Only thing is that the smell still comes out of my diaper pail. Maybe it’s just me but I find that I have to change out the bag after just a couple of dirty diapers. It’s a good thing that it’s bottomless so you can cut the bag at any length.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CONVIENENT!
customer_reviews.text: Makes changing the diaper pail easy. Also super easy to put in a new cartridge. Don't really have a scent.
customer_reviews.author: Spruill

customer_reviews.title: Super easy!
customer_reviews.text: The bags are super easy to use! Watch the video to see how the bags work.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bags that hold the smell
customer_reviews.text: These bags hold in the smell unlike normal trash bags. We love to use them in our diaper pail. We do have to use scissors every time it’s time to change the bag, but it’s an easy snip, and knot tie and your ready for the next batch of dirty diapers.
customer_reviews.author: ValdezReviews

customer_reviews.title: Easy, works well
customer_reviews.text: We love our Dekor! These bags make it so easy to fill and empty the pail. We’ve never had it tear or even stretch to the point it might break. It’s easy to set up and the instructions were clear. I always have to cut a little more than I think I’ll need in order to tie off the end but that’s no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Bags work good to hold discusting diapers
customer_reviews.text: Bags work good to hold discusting diapers. I gag each time I change the bag so I'm quite happy I've never had a bag break or tare, if it did I would probably have to call 911 bc there's no way I could handle that lol
customer_reviews.author: Eric and Kali

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper pail
customer_reviews.text: Writing this review after a year of use and still holding up well. I bought a box of the bag inserts when I bought the pail and just reordered another box after a year. I like the the double lid to make sure no smells escape and the bags are not scented so no artificial smell in the baby’s room.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Erion

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use but way too expensive. It is a tube of cheap, thin plastic for poop!! When you get towards the end of the tube you risk not having enough bag and then diapers fall all over. We will probably use regular trash bags after this.
customer_reviews.author: clm626

customer_reviews.title: Best bags ever!
customer_reviews.text: This diaper pail has been a life saver! The bags keep in the smell, are very sturdy and easy to change out. They can hold a lot with no breakage or rips. Definitely will continue ordering these for our Dekor Diaper Pail!
customer_reviews.author: AzureSkies

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this refill system - it's so easy to use. I love that you just cut the old bag and tie off for a new one. We originally thought we were going to just use regular trash bags with it (and I still love that you can do this if you want) but the refills make it so easy that we're sticking with them for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, keeps odors out and I love that the refill bags are not pre-sized so you don’t feel like you’re wasting anything if you decide to throw the bag out after a short or long time. After lots of research, this is probably the most economic option outside of just using your regular trash. I LOVEEE this diaper pail. Baby is almost 2 weeks old and I think we’ve switched the bag out 2, maybe 3 times. The bags also have a light scent to them which helps keep the pail smelling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Torres

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have.
customer_reviews.text: These are really quite handy to have. I don't feel like I'm wasting a lot using these over trash bags. What plastic you use is what you need to use. So far they have lasted us a long time. I'm still using the ones that came with my pail. It's been over a month!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have refills for diaper Dekor plus
customer_reviews.text: Worth the investment if you use a Dekor trash can. We use this diaper pail regularly and I find it so handy to be able to empty the bag, no matter how full it is. It's nice to empty the can whenever it gets a little too stinky and to not have to worry about wasting a whole bag. I find using this brand also helps contain the smell really well! I haven't tried normal trash bags like I've read you can use. The quality is thick and strong. The only time any smell is evident from this diaper pail is when I drop a diaper into it and it already has a stinky stock of old diapers in it...!
customer_reviews.author: Practical Mama

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These diaper pail refills are easy to install in less than five minutes, which is important when its 3am and your diaper pail is overflowing. The scent is pleasant and helps counteract the dirty diapers while not over powering at the same time. I have a certain level of piece of mind know the Dekor system is more ecofriendly than the traditional diaper genies and also the refills are cheaper. Help the wallet and the earth. How can you go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: terra

customer_reviews.title: Kids have been long out of diapers but this system works great for taking care of the dogs business
customer_reviews.text: The pail/refill system works for us. We have two city dogs and they are trained to toilet in a kennel. We keep the pail next to their kennel and a healthy supply of scented poop bags. As soon as the dogs finish their business in goes into the pail. When the pail is filled, it is reset with the new bag. Kids have been long out of diapers but this system works great for taking care of the dogs business.
customer_reviews.author: Actual User

customer_reviews.title: Great but could use improvements.
customer_reviews.text: I wish these were scented or odor controlling. I smell nothing but a plastic smell. It doesn’t control the odor at all. They are pretty easy to install and use but without charcoal odor controlling packets and wiping down the diaper pail occasionally with Clorox wipes. You’ll smell the poopie nappies.
customer_reviews.author: NerdyMom850

customer_reviews.title: The pail itself is sleek and easy to use and the refills were easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as one of my baby shower gifts and it has been one of my baby essentials. The pail itself is sleek and easy to use and the refills were easy to put inside the bin. The only drawerback for me is the price since we go through diapers so fast.
customer_reviews.author: eureka cabilulna

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely and definitely saves on garbage bags for diapers because you can take as many or as little as you'd like without wasting a bag. A scented bag would be the only upgrade that I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Rating a Trash Bag
customer_reviews.text: These are great because they do what they are supposed to do and that's because they are made by the company which manufactures the product they are made to fit. They are sturdy and seem "endless", easy to slice when full and have no scent that I've noticed. These are the best bags , better than the knock-offs. .
customer_reviews.author: HollyVSnoopD&FuzzyC

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would block out secent but it doesn’t do a very good job Definitely want to change more often
customer_reviews.author: Dawaun Lucas

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Dekor disposal system and the bags are great. I use it for my mom. The bags virtually eliminates the order. Plus I don't have to change bags as often! Great product I strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: While I do think these are a bit pricy, for me it's worth every penny. When you have a newborn it's all about doing chores the fast and easy way! This diaper pail system works perfectly for us. Now that my daughter has started solid food she makes some pretty stinky diapers and these bags contain smell impressively well. I should note though: the biodegradable ones didn't seem to contain the smell at all, won't be buying those again. But the regular ones rock!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. Easy to use and install with clear instructions. Diaper pails in general smell terrible. We manage to minimize odor by taking poopy diapers out instead of storing in Paul. These bags keep the Paul clean and odor free. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nannette M

customer_reviews.title: Is a refill... perhaps my install is incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 decor plus pails in my home. I bought this because I needed them. The problem im having is if I pull down with the lid down they tear. Not sure there is a fix so im working thru it. I thought it was user error and that I installed one incorrectly but I've done it 2 ways now and still rips.
customer_reviews.author: Kaila

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I have a Diaper Dekor Plus that is about 8 years old. I typically use generic refills for it with no problem. This time I ordered the “brand” refill and it did not fit. I made sure the refill was for the Dekor Plus, just like my pail. I tried to install the refill and it would not fit over the cartridge. I had my husband try and it did not fit. We estimate it is about 1-2 inches too small. Don’t know if they changed the Plus size pail design and made it narrower since I purchased mine, but this product did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Julie M. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and useful
customer_reviews.text: Putting in the liner is easy once you know and remember but difficult to put in first, second, third time. I forget from time to time. Use for husbands depends. Useful for that.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Just wish they would make it easier to take out the full and replace it with the empty which you have to tie manually which presents a problem with older people.
customer_reviews.author: Ps2os2

customer_reviews.title: A good system and refills
customer_reviews.text: We've used the Diaper Dekor for years, and find that it is a good system. The odor control is good, but not perfect, but the pail holds so many more diapers than the Diaper Genie. Less often changing the liner and less expensive. With our first child, we had one of each, and used one for pee diapers and one for poop diapers, because the Genie does mask odor a bit better. With our second child, we can't be bothered and the Dekor is just fine. Make sure to get the regular refills and not the eco-friendly ones, which apparently are problematic even though it's great to be environmentally friendly if the products are still up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: H. E.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This 2 pack refill got me through over 2 months of diapering. Who’s got time to be changing the diaper bag with a new baby when you can just pull down the new bag and re-tie the bottom? Easy to change and get back to your other mom duties.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessary, unless you can afford it
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome...but, a regular scented tall kitchen trash bag does the same thing. The diaper decor was designed to accept these OR a regular trash bag and for the money you spend on these you can buy 20 times as many trash bags. these are kind of unique because you can just pull down and use the built in razor inside the diaper pail to cut off the used bag and tie a knot on the new to creat a new bag! Brilliant! Except the forgot to make them affordable....but they still get people to buy them, intriguing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Golden

customer_reviews.title: Good Diaper Trash Bags
customer_reviews.text: Bags are good material and hold a lot of diapers (depending on size of the trash can). The only complaint I would have is that they do not have pre-tear stitching and will need to cut with knife or scissors and then tie up. Product itself is high quality and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Sanchez Jr

customer_reviews.title: Smells Awful
customer_reviews.text: I've used these in the past and loved them. Never had an issue with stink until the most recent batch. Its not just when I open the top it just stinks my entire bathroom up. I've emptied it, cleaned it, and aired it out and the minute I add a diaper it stinks to the high heavens. Not sure what changed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These work perfect with the diaper pail. They are thicker than normal garbage bag and it helps keep yucky smells in and they do not tear easy so no exploding bags of diapers so that's great! Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these with our diaper dispenser so we could have extra and they work great easy to use and perfect for the job. If they had scented ones like gain etc that would be amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these for close to 5 years with no complaints. They're great and easy to use. Simple instructions to follow come attached to each refill.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Mandrusiak

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome way to keep adult diaper smells at bay
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome way to keep adult diaper smells at bay. Easy to use, easy to cut bag portions out. We use the refills rather than trash bags as I think they are easier for my elderly father to manipulate.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D.

customer_reviews.title: I love the design of this diaper bin system
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of this diaper bin system. We've been using it for years, and it's great. As long as you don't mess up the bags, they're easy to put in. They last a long time, and hold everything in well.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: keeps odor down
customer_reviews.text: Pros - keeps the stinky diapers sealed up so the room doesn't smell. easy to install and use. Con - when the last big of the bag is being used and you are not aware that it is the last bit the diapers will fall through and pile up. made a awful smelly mess inside bc the bag was not catching them. will be more careful when changing the bag to ensure it isn't at the end of the roll. I have another diaper pale that just uses garbage bags. much easier but do think this is better. just need to have back up bags in the closet ready so when it is out you have one ready and waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This refill is very easy to install and easy to use. It’s more expensive than I thought, but I like that you only use and throw away what you need. Overall, it’s good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: No smell
customer_reviews.text: The thing that I like the most about this product is that you don't smell anything once the diaper goes into the diaper container with this product. The bad thing is that you need to use scissors to cut the portion that has diaper and then bring the bag part down again and tie it up. This is really an inconvenience than a problem. I would still us this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hekien

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the Dekor Plus pail
customer_reviews.text: Nothing can fully do battle with toddler diapers, but these liners make a gamely try. Can only usually catch a whiff when throwing in the new diaper.
customer_reviews.author: mdb0083

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of these refill reams! Got Dekor because you can use any bag but I loved the trial so much I ordered refills. Just makes life easier. Stinky diapers will still smell but the liners and can do a pretty good job of containing odors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refills are fine...
customer_reviews.text: But the actual system is so awful that I wouldn't consider ever getting it again. The diaper dekor has broken after a year and a half of use. I expect to get multiple years/children out of something like this but the little piece to cut the ends of the bag was first to go (it is just a razor blade that is affixed to inside of the pail but it was useful when we needed to change the bag). Then the inner lid went. On top of all of this the system is really not great, and doesn't contain the smell of pee only diapers well. I would never again purchase this system. But the refills work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Dizor

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t really prevent smell so I change it out a lot more so our daughters room doesn’t smell but other than that they are a great value, they are very durable ‘bags’
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best product out there!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install, keeps dirty diapers from smelling anything in the room or even the pail. Been using these for 3+ years and pail still does not stink.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Says

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for 2yrs now, no complaints. Works as expected.. Like the choose a size option, so if the garbage is extra smelly I can just tear off and toss, instead of wasting a whole garbage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Liners
customer_reviews.text: Good diaper pail liners. This diaper pail in particular is bigger than the typical diaper genie, so considering that these liners let a while.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Carswell

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd found this product years ago
customer_reviews.text: I am a dog groomer and I am always picking up dog poop and putting it in the trash which stinks up the whole shop.with this system I can put in a week's worth of dog poop in the can and you smell nothing!
customer_reviews.author: chickenlady4

customer_reviews.title: LOVE OUR DEKOR
customer_reviews.text: We love it, does better than any pail I've encountered and the refills don't waste plastic on an insert- the bag's plastic is folded in a way that simply sits in your pail. I'm delighted there is no cartridge that needs to be disposed of. Our planet thanks you
customer_reviews.author: Happy Reader

customer_reviews.title: complicated but doable by a 14 year old.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for adult diapers. It works but you need to read the directions carefully. Odor control is good but could be better,
customer_reviews.author: dragon slayer

customer_reviews.title: Been using these for 7 years
customer_reviews.text: The diaper Dekor has been used for all four of my children. My oldest is 7 years old and it has lasted. The 4 pack of refill bags are great and lasted us a little over 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Dogbe

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item sent
customer_reviews.text: I received an item called babyfeel refill four pack. It is comparable to Diaper dekor CLASSIC. I purchased the Dekor Plus refill. This size does not fit the plus. I am having to return this and order it again. How do I ensure I get the correct item?
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Clemson

customer_reviews.title: Product was as described. We use it in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. We use it in the Dekor Paul we have for nighttime for my two children and it has been 2 months and I am just now putting the second refill on.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: They work well and a sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: If you got the Dekor diaper pail, you will need these refill bags. They work well and a sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: These are great, easy to use, contain the smell well, and I love the measure-your-own system. I just wish they were cheaper - with how many diapers we go through, we change refills in about 1-2 weeks, so we're spending $15+ a month on trash bags.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper pail and liners!
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper pail . I have used other brands in past and this is the best . There is little to no odor. Liners are very durable and keep out odor . Very easy to change out. Just follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lee

customer_reviews.title: Love my Diaper Dekor and refills
customer_reviews.text: I can't find a better diaper pail and refill system. Seriously, we even had a spring rust out on the "flap" and the company replaced them FREE OF CHARGE....twice! These refills are ingenious and make it so simple to change the bag that even my darling HUSBAND can do it. Honestly, he's the guy that doesn't even empty the bathroom trash on trash day - if it's not sitting next to the kitchen trash, it's not going out. So for him to empty the Diaper Dekor and haul the dirty diapers to the laundry room - the system MUST be easy! We've used the same system for 2 years and do not have an odor problem, either.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They're ok
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape and design of the Diaper Dekor Plus. It's larger than the regular one, so less emptying out of the bag. However, this also means that the dirty diapers sit in there longer and get really ripe, gross! I've found that the seal on these pails do not hold in the smell as well as the Diaper Genies. The plastic for the refills is a good thickness, they just don't hold in the odor as well. Perhaps it isn't the bags so much as it is the pail design itself. I also wish these refills would last longer. I feel like it runs out after only 4 full "bags". Overall, like I said, they're ok.
customer_reviews.author: Yary

customer_reviews.title: Fits as intended. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Refills fit perfect with the decor plus as intended. Easy refill process. Highly recommend buying refills is the same order with the diaper pail. A baby registry must.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love the whole dekor system. It really keeps the scent of all the dirty diapers contained. The bags are a little tricky to put in, but once you do it one time it’s so easy after that.
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: Good system, a little stinky
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like the diaper pail design. But the bags could use a little more scent protection. I take them out regularly, but if my baby has a particularly bad bowel movement, we take it out right away or the smell builds.
customer_reviews.author: MommyT

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Way easier to install than expected! Durable and not letting smell out. Good price. I have the decor plus I think but theyll work on all models as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sutton

customer_reviews.title: We love these diaper pail refills. Been using them since our son was a newborn. He's 3 now.
customer_reviews.text: We like the ease of use. We're potty training our son, but he's not there yet, so having these diaper pail refill is important for us.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these diaper pails. One upstairs and one downstairs. I actually use cloth diapers but I keep these for wipes and the occasional disposable diaper. This is so easy to use and install. Super easy system. Keeps the smell away and holds quite a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Jrc85

customer_reviews.title: Diaper genie bags
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it’s a great product. I made the mistake in ordering this when I don’t have the delux genie it’s paired with but I made it work
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it describes. Im not counting diapers obviously, but it definitely holds about 1-2 weeks worth of diapers at a time before i have to cut and replace.
customer_reviews.author: Ja'Quan

customer_reviews.title: Really keeps the bad smell trapped in the pail.
customer_reviews.text: I think they can be cheaper. But these really work well. No foul odour from the diaper pail when this is in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liners - easy to use, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: These liner refills are easy to install and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Marlin

customer_reviews.title: This is for the Dekor Plus container and refills
customer_reviews.text: Not just for diapers! Disabled , Elderly, Kidney patients please consider If you have a senior in your home , that uses any sort of pad for incontenance, this is great answer to disposal situation. Nice large opening, and easy to tie off bottom of liner. Takes up small space in bathroom, and resembles small garbage container. Any one in wheel chair will like this product as you can take care of your needs yourself. Please check out the Dekor Plus container, both great products.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dishner

product_meta.title: Dekor Plus Diaper Pail Refills | 2 Count | Most Economical Refill System | Quick & Easy to Replace | No Preset Bag Size – Use Only What You Need | Exclusive End-of-Liner Marking | Baby Powder Scent
product_meta.description: Size:2 CountDiaper Dekor Plus Refill - 2 packCheck out Diaper Dekor Plus Refills for your Diaper Dekor diaper disposal system. These refill liners are powder scented, strong, and easy to use, plus their ingenious design means less emptying. These refills are designed as a single, long continuous liner, which means you can change as frequently or as infrequently as you want - you're in total control of how much refill you use each time you empty your Diaper Dekor pail. Empty after one really smelly change or wait until your pail is totally stuffed. These refills are ultra-tough on odors, but remember that emptying more often will help keep odors in your nursery under control. These refills are made of 20% recycled materials, so even though you're using disposable diapers, your refill will be easier on landfills and the environment. If you want to be extra conscious, Diaper Dekor also makes biodegradable refills, which break down faster than the regular refills. Because these refills hold a whopping 1160 diapers - that's a ton more diapers than the leading competitor - they'll save you money. Considering you'll make over 5000 diaper changes over the course of your baby's life, you should choose the most economical refill available. How do Diaper Dekor Plus Refills stack up against the competition? These refills hold almost twice as many diapers per refill than the Diaper Genie II Elite pail. That's a lot of diapers! So, what size refill should you choose? First, know which size Dekor pail you own, Classic, Plus, or XL, then check the information on the inside of your pail's front service door. The size of your liner should match the size of the pail on the inside of your service door. Here's a handy tip - plus-size refills are compatible with all of the plus-size pails in the Dekor line.Packaging May Vary Please note: Diaper Dekor has recently changed their packaging so the product you receive may not be as pictured. The products themselves will remain the same. It is made of strong material that helps in keeping the nursery clean and free from unpleasant odors. Each refill pack can hold up to 670 diapers and is extremely easy to use. It can help in keeping your baby's nursery free from unwanted smells and trash. Changing the Diaper Dekor refill is quick and easy. Just pull out the refill cartridge, slip a refill over, and replace the cartridge in the pail. Pull down the refill, tie a knot, and you're done! Recommended Age: For use with the Diaper Dekor Plus PailFeatures:Huge capacity makes them extremely economical Each refill/bag liner holds up to 670 diapers 2 Pack. Dékor diaper pails use a reusable cartridge system and thereby eliminating extra plastic that would go into our landfills.
feature_bullets: Use with Dekor Plus Hands-Free Diaper Pail
No Preset Perforations or Bag Size
Empty As Often As You Want, Use Only As Much Refill As Needed
NEW End of Liner Marking - Helpful Reminder Before You Run Out!
Fresh Powder Scent Helps Neutralize Odors
Each Box Contains 2 Refills and Holds Up to 1160 Newborn Diapers
